name: Eternal Abundance

hasMenuItem.name: The Incredi-Bowl
hasMenuItem.description:
Made with certified organic ingredients.

House salad served with your choice of topping, avocado, brown rice or quinoa, topped with sprouts and sesame seeds. Choice of dressing: miso ginger, Caesar, turmeric-sesame.

Espresso is not included - please choose a shot as an add on.
All organic, vegan, and gluten-free, as ever :-)

review.reviewBody: A bit pricey but always very high quality and fresh. Love this place <3
More lettuce than beans or substance for this high pricing :,( not filling at  all, this ratio should cost $10 .....not $25+
Not worth the price. Decent taste but the salad was so small even after upgrading to the large it was almost laughable.
best tasting vegan, gluten free  organic sustenance in the city made by the best people. have been a customer for 12 years
the Mint Choco Chip is tasty! Not very minty, it's a subtle coolness instead. Feels great, will order again
